quick_start:
Hereâ€™s a quick start guide:
1. Simple AI operates on a command-based interface, every command begins with `:`.
To register a user, use command `:user add [username] [email] [password?]` (no brackets needed) âœ….
For example, `:user add john xxxx@zzzz.vv ********`
* The password must be at least 8 characters long.
2. To log in, use the command `:user login [password]` ğŸ”‘
3. Forgot your password? Use the command `:user reset pass [username] [email]` ğŸ†˜.
4. To access the documentation and confirm usage: click the dot (â€¢) in the screen corner ğŸ“„.
5. To navigate between logs, use the `â¬…ï¸` and `â¡ï¸` arrow keys. ğŸ—‚ï¸
6. To navigate between histories (sessions), use the `â¬†ï¸` and `â¬‡ï¸` arrow keys. ğŸ“œ
7. To switch to fullscreen mode, use `F11`,  for split-screen use `Control+|` ğŸ–¥ï¸.
8. Change theme: use `:theme [light|dark|terminal]` ğŸŒˆ.
* The general `user` account is free; you only have to pay for tokens. You can manage your token balance on the Usage page ğŸ’³.
